page.title: 07Farming in Ashby St Ledgers.
page.content: There are six farms in the parish. "Ashby Farms" has four farms- Ashby St Ledgers' Farm, Bramley farm, Chapel farm, and Ashby farm.There are two tenant farms called Reynolds farm and Home farm. Ashby farms have 2200 acres, with 600 breeding ewes, 15 rams, and 300 heifers.Bramley farm and Chapel farm have 150 dairy cattle each.All meat goes to Midland Meat Packers. The main crops are wheat, barley, oilseed rape, beans and peas, at Ashby farm. There is employment for ten fulltime workers; at Home farm there are three. Ashby farms have three combine harvesters . Farmers have ploughed up fields to lay drainage and have pulled up hedges to make more space.
